text:
Hey guys, welcome to day 1 of my Contiki New Zealand Grand Explorer tour.So 
 we are going to be travelling around New Zealand for 15 days.

So today we are going up north for a day and then we are going to go down the 
 north island and all the way down the south island. We are going to see alot of stuff.

Hey guys. So we arrived here is Paihia, 
 and I met some awesome Canadian friends.

So this is Jessica and Paul. Yes. I am horrible 
 with names. You will learn that very soon.

And what are we about to do? Man: Parasailing. Nadine: yea, we are about to 
 go parasailing out there, but are waiting for a boat to come in.

I'm excited.I've never parasailed before. you guys parasailed before? Man: 
 no first time. Nadine: Fist time parasailers!
Girl: That was awesome. Sweet. Nadine: Was it amazing? Man: Awesome.
Man: Are ou ready? Nadine: I am so ready! Oh my gosh...

Wow. You see alot up here. This ride goes on forever. It's 
 been 20 min. Man: It's good. Beautiful view. Nadine: Enjoy..
Man: Did you have fun guys? Yea.....
